description:
FiiO X3 Lossless Music Player with Sandisk 64GB Ultra MicroSD Extension Pack includes coaxial converter with SMIC brand high quality 3ft gold plated coaxial audio cable and 3ft 3.5mm stereo male-to-male audio cable.  The Fiio X3 Portable Music Player is a pocket-sized audio player with a built-in WOLFSON WM8740 DAC chip and an AD8397 amplifier chip that supports up to 300mA output and warm A-class amplifier quality. The player supports five lossless audio formats including APE, FLAC, ALAC, WMA and WAV. Plus, it also features master copy class audio playback.

The player has 8GB of flash memory and the microSD card slot supports up to 64GB of memory expansion. It offers multiple digital and analog audio output options as well. The built-in rechargeable battery recharges via USB and provides up to 10 hours of continuous playback. The player is also equipped with a 2.4" TFT color display and adjustable circuit hardware for bass and treble controls.
title: Fiio X3 24Bit/192K Lossless Mastering Quality Music Player w/ Sandisk 64GB External MicroSD Memory & Coaxial Connection Kit
